mapper.select: SELECT A.COMPANY_CD , A.BIZ_CD , A.AXIS_ID , (SELECT COMM_CD_NM FROM SC_COMM_CD WHERE COMM_GRP_CD = 'AXIS_ID' AND COMM_CD = A.AXIS_ID ) AXIS_NM , A.GROUPING_ID , A.GROUPING_NM FROM CM0701 A WHERE A.COMPANY_CD = 'dx' AND A.BIZ_CD = 'SP1' AND A.AXIS_ID = 'MEDF' ORDER BY A.GROUPING_ID ASC
